title: Anno 1404 Dawn Of Discovery-Razor1911

Razor 1911 proudly presents:
Anno 1404 - Dawn of Discovery
(C) UbiSoft

Date: 2009-07-07 Game Type : Strategy
Size: 1 DVD Protection: Solidshield Tages Product Activation

Game Notes

Dawn of Discovery takes place in the year 1404, when King Georges land is
suffering from severe droughts and brutal famine. Aware of his peoples
distress, the king calls on his two sons, William and Edward, to acquire new
territories in order to produce enough goods to satisfy the needs of his
empires inhabitants. Whereas Edward suggests aggressive means to collect
the precious resources, his brother William offers a peaceful solution,
proposing to explore new and unsettled lands in the south of the kingdom
With his Fathers blessing, William heads south to the mysterious Orient and
returns with valuable new technologies such as the water pump that allows
dry lands to be cultivated in order to produce enough food for the people
But there are still many unmet needs within the kings empire, and players
are tasked with the mission of fulfilling those needs while both expanding
and sustaining the vast society

Install Notes

1. Extract RARs
2. Mount or burn image
3. Install
4. Copy the cracked Anno4.exe to your installation dir overwriting the
existing one (you may also delete the files dvm.dll & TagesClient. now
to save some 50MB of wasted diskspace
5. Run the game using Anno4.exe (update your gu.exe shortcuts accordingly
to avoid update problems
6. Have fun

If you need help use the included 4 Trainer located in the crack dir

Razor 1911 Greetings

Apparently the usual suspects haven't dug up any unprotected demo, beta,
hawaiian multi 12 or whatever binary to copy from, so we finally decided to
go all the way and do a full VM rebuild of the original. Enjoy

R.I.P Jacko
